alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 2:40PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fremont and southwestern Teller Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 239 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cripple Creek, or 26 miles west of Colorado Springs, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Victor around 250 PM MDT. Cripple Creek around 255 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
